title: [GAMEPLAY] Mecha Kha'Zix using VO lines for evolutions that haven't been unlocked yet.
body:
I was playing Mecha Kha'Zix a few minutes ago, and I heard a few lines i usually don't hear until the very end of the game.
"From the Dark" and "my Wings are restless" at level 1 during lane phase, these phrases aren't usually used until he evolves the associated ability. "From The Dark" is Active Camouflage, his R evolution, and "my wings are restless" are for his wings obviously.

It's not a super big deal and it's not even negatively impacting to my game experience but I know for a fact it's not intentional.

replies.body:
Hey again! 

I spoke with the audio bros to see what's going on and they said that this isn't a bug - we changed how his VO works. All evolved lines were actually broken and not playing - so we just put all evolved lines in his default attack and moves.

Hope this clears things up. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=vhzEuMVy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-10T17:24:33.323+0000)
>
> Hey again! 
> 
> I spoke with the audio bros to see what's going on and they said that this isn't a bug - we changed how his VO works. All evolved lines were actually broken and not playing - so we just put all evolved lines in his default attack and moves.
> 
> Hope this clears things up. ^-^

I'm fine with that, more VO lines is good with me.
Sweet deal! Figured you of all people should be in the loop on this one. :P

Hey, friend! 

Thanks for the report! It appears as though a bug is reporting a bug. ^-^ Lemme take a look at his audio and see what's going on.
